title: Transforming Experience into Long-Term Memory

definitions.Self-reflection: is a mechanism to build a long-term memory of self-reflective experiences which allows humans to identify their own errors and self-suggest lessons to learn from their mistakes over time.

summary: The slide discusses how humans learn from their mistakes to improve performance on tasks. It introduces self-reflection as a mechanism for building long-term memory of self-reflective experiences, which helps in identifying errors and learning from them over time.
